ats:Military Tradition.NAME: Transporter-Type Meebo
ats:Military Tradition.FLAVOR: The “Great Meebo Monument” is covered with the codenames of its compatriots, but it knows no joy or sorrow. It simply wants to work.

#ySP.

ats:Ability Aura.NAME: Braintet
ats:Ability Aura.FLAVOR: A new type of energy draught developed by Parasol Pharmaceuticals. It’s sugar free, has a minty taste, and has no side effects.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn, Gain #b
#ySP.

ats:Omniscience.NAME: “Self-Defense Handbook”
ats:Omniscience.FLAVOR: Its complete title is, “Handbook of Self-Defense When Traveling to the City-States of Other Countries Surrounding Laterano and the Zones Between Them.” You can read it, but you can’t learn anything from it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 25% temporary HP each combat.

ats:Sanity.NAME: Sanity
DESCRIPTIONS: Return #ySP and gain block by half of #ySP you consumed first during each turn. (Maximum #b5)

ats:Sanity Plus.NAME: Sanity+
ats:Sanity Plus.FLAVOR: "Doctor, don't take it secretly and eat it!"
DESCRIPTIONS: #rReplaces #rSanity. Return #ySP and gain block by half of #ySP you consumed first during each turn. NL #yMaximum #ySP #yLimit increased by #b10.

ats:Berate.NAME: Captain Morgan’s Wine
ats:Berate.FLAVOR: A wine produced in the Iberian region. Despite having gained popularity in the heart of Victoria’s bustling cities, it is now discontinued.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play attack card, gain #b
#ySP.

ats:Industrial Water Cannon.NAME: Superelastic Alloy Spring
ats:Industrial Water Cannon.FLAVOR: High-quality springs with several times the elasticity of normal springs. Regardless of how you use them, be careful not to hurt yourself.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you consume #ySP , draw a card.

ats:Bonebreaker.NAME: Corroded Silver Lance
ats:Bonebreaker.FLAVOR: A lance that can pierce mountains and lakes, accompanied by the trampling of hooves that can disperse gathered clouds. Fireworks and advertisements have dulled everyone’s memories, but they are still out there.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every attacks will have #b
minimum damage.

ats:Arts.NAME: Sabotage Co-op Expansion
ats:Arts.FLAVOR: It is difficult to gain the upper hand in frontline combat with only a single squad of Operators. Supplementing combat capabilities through Co-ops is an effective solution.

ats:Hidden Killer.NAME: Hidden Killer
ats:Hidden Killer.FLAVOR: Why don't you reach out your hand to her?
DESCRIPTIONS: If you do not play any #yAttacks during your turn, gain #b2 Strength for next turn.

ats:Gyao.NAME: "Roar" Pendant
ats:Gyao.FLAVOR: An amulet circulated among a few members of the L.G.D. who don’t take their work very seriously. Said to be able to double one’s bonuses.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b15 additional gold when you obtain gold.

ats:Originium.NAME: Originium Addiction
ats:Originium.FLAVOR: Closer is said to be looking for the missing pure Orginium.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yMaximum #ySP increased by #b10.

ats:Tactical Delivery.NAME: Crate of Explosive Building Materials
ats:Tactical Delivery.FLAVOR: Rhodes Island’s portable basic building materials kits are limited in quantity. If lost, please reapply for redistribution. Please assemble according to the instructions.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. #yMaximum #ySP #yLimit decreased by #b20.

ats:Emergency Defibrillator.NAME: Emergency Defibrillator
ats:Emergency Defibrillator.FLAVOR: Do not act violently while the defibrillator is in operation.
DESCRIPTIONS: When attacked damage reduces your health to less than #b25%, attacked damage reduced to 0 for this turn and heal #b50% HP at the start of the next turn. (works once)
Attacked damage reduced to 0. Heal #b50% HP at the start of the next turn.

ats:Remnant Ash.NAME: Remnant Ash
DESCRIPTIONS: When you gain critical damage, your HP will not fall below 1, but you will die after 2 turns. (works once)
Your HP will not fall below 1. You will die after #b
turn.

ats:Hearts K.NAME: King of Hearts
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of battle, reduce #b4 #yStrength of ALL enemies for 1 turn.

ats:Hearts K Plus.NAME: King of Hearts+
ats:Hearts K Plus.FLAVOR: "Just gotta kill them all to finish the job, right? Don’t think in such simple terms? But that’s a pain in the ass..."
DESCRIPTIONS: At the starts of battle, #ystun ALL enemies.
